attributes.action: Raise awareness of Dyslexia online and to make peoples attitudes change towards being just a FAT persons excuse
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over the last few days it has been brought to my aatention that many people are using the term Dyslexia online as an excuse to have personal digs at other users just for being of larger preportions.

Saying you are stupid, fat,greasy, chunky fingers bashing the keyboard whilst typing and not understand that many world famous people DO and DID have Dyslexia

Not willing to accept it when being told that the person who has made a post is Dyslexic and this is why they have poor spelling and grammer,it is about time this was stopped and we had more rights from the goverment protecting us.
attributes.creator_name: The Honourable Lady Sarah Jane Wilkinson

rejection.details: It is unclear what your petition is requesting. Please reword and resubmit.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
